attributes.action: Ensure that action is taken against the individual who assaulted Peter Mandelson on the 6th March 2009 and also the people who have publically incited the public to support such an illegal action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Rule of Law must prevail and to condone anything else destroys democracy.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
